item.title: Were shall I put Item On item codes?
item.dc:creator: @Ocke Ocke
item.description:
@Ocke wrote:

I want to have Herblore working so I got some item on item codes…
But were shall I write them in?
In which folder/file
I got this code

if ((itemUsed == 3000) && (useWith == 227) || (itemUsed == 227) && (useWith == 3000)) { if (playerLevel[15] >= 0) { deleteItem(3000, getItemSlot(3000), 1); deleteItem(227, getItemSlot(227), 1); addItem(3024, 1); addSkillXP(2800, 15); setAnimation(1652); } else { sM("You need 1 herblore to make this potion."); } }

So I’m gonna edit that code-Is it good?- were shall I write it in?

Read full topic
item.source: Were shall I put Item On item codes?
